sn22.154:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa micchaditthi uppajjati”ti?
sn22.154:1.4: “rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa micchaditthi uppajjati.
sn22.154:1.8: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa micchaditthi uppajjati.
sn22.154:1.13: api nu tam anupadaya micchaditthi uppajjeyya”ti?
sn22.154:1.20: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.154:1.22: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, api nu tam anupadaya micchaditthi uppajjeyya”ti?
